channel.title: Comments on: Apple and Sage Roast Pork

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Lovely photo of the roo. The baked apples sound divine and I like the way you used homegrown potatoes.
item.content:encoded: Lovely photo of the roo. The baked apples sound divine and I like the way you used homegrown potatoes.

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: What a beautiful leg of pork! You should be really proud of that. And what a lovely looking farm-figs and banana flowers are two of my favourite things. Nice gumboots too! :)
item.content:encoded: What a beautiful leg of pork! You should be really proud of that. And what a lovely looking farm-figs and banana flowers are two of my favourite things. Nice gumboots too! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Jesse
item.dc:creator: Jesse
item.description: Oh my word, that pork is just PERFECT. I'm drooling all over my keyboard now... seriously, I had to remind myself to swallow! And I love your wellies, very fashionable farm wear! ;)
item.content:encoded: Oh my word, that pork is just PERFECT. I’m drooling all over my keyboard now… seriously, I had to remind myself to swallow! And I love your wellies, very fashionable farm wear! ðŸ˜‰
